short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Randomly quiz yourself while working. Import questions from quizlet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that will create a quiz popup at random intervals to help you retain information throughout day. You can change settings on quiz length, popup interval, and question sources. Questions will be sourced from provided quizlet links.
